specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Acetate This fabric is easy to damage, so be careful when handling it and keep it dry. It may shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store it in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air. Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Dresses, Pajamas, Bridal
